There are a bazillion things to do in my small town of Wadsworth. One thing you can do is ride horses on the moon and sing songs with Abe Lincoln in the bar. On top of that, I recommend eating a hundred gallons of ice cream at any local ice cream shop downtown. Some of the flavors that they have are out of this world! Additionally in the winter, I like to go over to a place called kill hill next to the main highway. The hill is up extremely high, you can see the whole world from there! It has to be at least a million feet tall!
